General.Name: Shenzhen Kaizhong Precision Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Kaizhong Precision Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of core precision components in China and internationally. The company offers new energy vehicle components, motor commutators, collector rings, communications and consumer products, air control components, high-strength elastic parts, drive motor connectors, and electronic control system inverter components, and vehicle lightweight parts, as well as power battery pack components comprising cellframes, busbars, etc. It also provides multi-layer insulated wires, intelligent equipment, connectors, motor components, hardware, plastic products, machined parts, battery accessories, automotive electronic control accessories, auto parts, equipment and molds, slip rings, and precise tools. The company's products are used in automotive electrification and intelligent driving, rail transit, aerospace, communications, consumer electronics, health care, smart home and office, smart equipment, photovoltaic power generation equipment, and other fields. In addition, it engages in investment, trading, and leasing business, as well as provision of business services. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

5.Name: Mr. Jianping  Wang
5.Title: Chairman of the Supervisory Board & GM of Marketing Center
